dcterms:creator: Lei Wang
Dongxiang Zhang
Lianli Gao
Jingkuan Song
Long Guo
Heng Tao Shen
dcterms:description: A Chinese dataset containing 23,161 math word problems of elementary school level, used for training and evaluating models in solving math word problems.
dcterms:title: Math23K

dcterms:creator: Shen-Yun Miao
Chao-Chun Liang
Keh-Yih Su
dcterms:description: The arithmetic subset of ASDiv containing 1,218 math word problems mostly up to grade level 4, used for evaluating and developing English math word problem solvers.
dcterms:title: Asdiv-A

dcterms:creator: Vivek Kumar
Rishabh Maheshwary
Vikram Pudi
dcterms:description: A challenge dataset constructed of adversarial examples for evaluating math word problem solvers, focusing on the robustness of models against textual variations.
dcterms:title: Adv-Asdiv-SP

dcterms:creator: Vivek Kumar
Rishabh Maheshwary
Vikram Pudi
dcterms:description: A challenge dataset for Chinese math word problems, generated from the Math23K validation set using data augmentation techniques to create semantically similar but misleading examples.
dcterms:title: HE-MWP
